mapper.select: SELECT cifs.id AS columnId, cifs.column_name AS columnName, cifd.id AS id, cifd.check_item_id AS checkItemId, cifs.seq AS seq, cifd.row_index AS rowIndex, cifd.column_value AS columnValue FROM check_item_form_setting AS cifs LEFT JOIN check_item_form_data AS cifd ON cifd.setting_id = cifs.id AND cifd.row_index = #{item.rowIndex} WHERE cifs.check_item_id = #{item.checkItemId}
